title: practice tool has missing characters
body: {{champion:266}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:34}}  help me update this list if you find champions missing.

replies.body:
If you're referring to the bots to vs, they've always been missing.
The list of bots for customs is even smaller than the coop vs AI list: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Co-op_vs._AI


 -----------------------------
There is a pool of 67 champions that the bots can be picked from.
They are as follows:
Note: Xerath bot is not available in custom games.
Note: Sona bot was removed following her remake.
Note: Aatrox, Anivia, Azir, Bard, Diana, Draven, Ekko, Elise, Evelynn, Fiora, Gnar, Gragas, Hecarim, Illaoi, Janna, Jayce, Kalista, Karma, Kassadin, Kennen, Kha'Zix, Kindred, LeBlanc, Lee Sin, Lissandra, Lulu, Mordekaiser, Nautilus, Poppy, Rek'Sai, Rengar, Riven, Rumble, Sejuani, Shaco, Singed, Skarner, Syndra, Talon, Thresh, Tryndamere, Twisted Fate, Twitch, Urgot, Varus, Vayne, Vel'Koz, Vi, Viktor, Volibear, Zac, and Zed bot are yet to be added.

I just played a practice session as Akali, IDK why she isn't appearing on your end.
He's clearly talking about the bots, which have never existed as they haven't been added to the game yet

Sorry to revive an old post but does anyone know why only certain champs are available to practice against?
Are champs like {{champion:157}} and {{champion:90}} to difficult for a bot to control or something?
I'm guessing they just never bothered to write a bot script for them.
